shorts.title: Pa. woman, son charged in ballot-tampering investigation
shorts.description: A mother and son face felony and misdemeanor charges stemming from an investigation into ballot tampering at a West Scranton polling place during the Nov. 4 municipal election. The Lackawanna County district attorney’s office charged Kathie Sico, 67, and Mich…

shorts.title: Gentex Corporation Secures Third Year Option on its Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II Contract Worth $38.4 Million
shorts.title_distilled: Gentex Corporation Secures Third Year Option on its Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II Contract Worth $38.
shorts.description: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency (DLA) has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II (ACH Gen II) production contract (SPE1C1-23-D-0004) awarded to Gentex Corporation. Valued at up t…
shorts.content: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency (DLA) has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II (ACH Gen II) production contract (SPE1C1-23-D-0004) awarded to Gentex Corporation. Valued at up t…
shorts.content_distilled: CARBONDALE, PA, November 13, 2025 — The Defense Logistics Agency  has exercised the third one-year option period of the Advanced Combat Helmet Generation II  production contract  awarded to Gentex Corporation.

shorts.title: HS ROUNDUP: Farrell helps Holy Cross earn win over Pittston Area
shorts.title_distilled: HS ROUNDUP: Farrell helps Holy Cross earn win over Pittston Area.
shorts.description: Colin Farrell led Holy Cross’s balanced scoring attack with 17 points to lead Holy Cross to a 58-42 win over Pittston Area in a nonleague boys basketball game on Monday. Thomas Gavin scored 15 points for the Crusaders (2-1), while Adam Badyrka, Cole Gavin and Jack Alpert each scored eight. Lucas LoPresto led Pittston Area with 11 points. Jacob Ivey and Brennan Callahan each scored 10. Dunmore 79, Mountain View 39: Carter Sload scored nine of his 18 points and Brayden Canavan had eight of his 18 points in a 34-point first-quarter outburst by the third-ranked Bucks. Nate Aviles also scored […]
shorts.content: Colin Farrell led Holy Cross’s balanced scoring attack with 17 points to lead Holy Cross to a 58-42 win over Pittston Area in a nonleague boys basketball game on Monday. Thomas Gavin scored 15 points for the Crusaders (2-1), while Adam Badyrka, Cole Gavin and Jack Alpert each scored eight. Lucas LoPresto led Pittston Area with 11 points. Jacob Ivey and Brennan Callahan each scored 10. Dunmore 79, Mountain View 39: Carter Sload scored nine of his 18 points and Brayden Canavan had eight of his 18 points in a 34-point first-quarter outburst by the third-ranked Bucks. Nate Aviles also scored […]
shorts.content_distilled: Colin Farrell led Holy Cross’s balanced scoring attack with 17 points to lead Holy Cross to a 58-42 win over Pittston Area in a nonleague boys basketball game on Monday.

shorts.title: Scranton police seek public help after chihuahua found in dumpster
shorts.title_distilled: Scranton police seek public help after chihuahua found in dumpster.
shorts.description: Scranton Police are looking for any information from the public after a chihuahua was found in a dumpster on Saturday along North St. Frances Cabrini Avenue.

shorts.description: (WBRE/WYOU) — The Future Alert Weather team is tracking several chances of snow and waves of arctic air for the work week and coming weekend, and 28/22 News Meteorologist Josh Hodell has the forecast. Monday night may turn out frigid and clear, with low temperatures projected to be in the single digits, and at times, [...]
